rows.name: Blood Money
rows.text: [Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.) Kill a unit at a battlefield with 2 [S] or less. If it was an enemy unit, play a Gold gear token exhausted. If it was a friendly unit, play two Gold gear tokens exhausted.
rows.raw:
[Action]  (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)

rows.name: Rally the Troops

[Action]  (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)

rows.name: Azir, Emperor of the Sands
rows.text: Sand Soldiers you play have [Weaponmaster]. (When they're played, you may [Equip] one of your Equipment to them for [A] less.) [1], [T]: Play a 2 [S] Sand Soldier unit token to your base. Use only if you've played an Equipment this turn.

[1], [T]: Play a 2 [S] Sand Soldier unit token to your base. Use only if you've played an Equipment this turn.

rows.name: Arise!
rows.text: Play a 2 [S] Sand Soldier unit token for each Equipment you control. Then ready two of them.
rows.raw: Play a 2 [S] Sand Soldier unit token for each Equipment you control. Then ready two of them.

rows.name: Renata Glasc, Chem-Baroness
rows.trigger: When you or an ally hold
rows.text: you may exhaust me to play a Gold gear token exhausted. While your score is within 3 points of the Victory Score, your Gold add an additional [1].
rows.raw:
When you or an ally hold, you may exhaust me to play a Gold gear token exhausted.
While your score is within 3 points of the Victory Score, your Gold [ADD] an additional [1].

rows.name: Hostile Takeover
rows.text: [Hidden] (Hide now for [A] to react with later for [0].) Take control of an enemy unit at a battlefield. Ready it. (Start a combat if other enemies are there. Otherwise, conquer.) Lose control of that unit and recall it at end of turn. (Send it to base. This isn't a move.)
rows.raw:
[Hidden]  (Hide now for [A] to react with later for [0].) 
Take control of an enemy unit at a battlefield. Ready it.  (Start a combat if other enemies are there. Otherwise, conquer.) 
Lose control of that unit and recall it at end of turn.  (Send it to base. This isn't a move.)

rows.text: you may exhaust me to play a Gold gear token exhausted. When one or more enemy units die, ready me.

When one or more enemy units die, ready me.

rows.raw: When you conquer here, you may pay [1] and return a unit you control here to its owner's hand. If you do, play a 2 [S] Sand Soldier unit token here.

rows.text: draw 1 for each other battlefield you or allies control.
rows.raw: When you conquer here, draw 1 for each other battlefield you or allies control.

rows.text: you may pay [1] to draw 1. (A unit is Mighty while it has 5+ [S].)

rows.trigger: When you attach an Equipment to me
rows.text: choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn — - Ready 2 runes. - Channel 1 rune exhausted. - Buff a friendly unit.

- Ready 2 runes.
- Channel 1 rune exhausted.
- Buff a friendly unit.

rows.text: [Deflect] (Opponents must pay [A] to choose me with a spell or ability.) When you choose or ready me, give me +1 [S] this turn.
rows.raw:
[Deflect]  (Opponents must pay [A] to choose me with a spell or ability.) 
When you choose or ready me, give me +1 [S] this turn.

rows.name: Soraka, Wanderer
rows.text: I must be assigned combat damage last. If another unit you control here would die, if it has less Might than me, instead heal it, exhaust it, and recall it. (Send it to base. This isn't a move.)
rows.raw:
I must be assigned combat damage last.
If another unit you control here would die, if it has less Might than me, instead heal it, exhaust it, and recall it.  (Send it to base. This isn't a move.)

rows.name: Ezreal, Prodigal Explorer
rows.text: [T]: [Reaction] — Draw 1. Use only if you've chosen enemy units and/or gear twice this turn with spells or unit abilities.
rows.raw: [T]: [Reaction] — Draw 1. Use only if you've chosen enemy units and/or gear twice this turn with spells or unit abilities.

rows.name: Vayne, Hunter
rows.text: [Assault 3] (+3 might while I'm an attacker.) If an opponent controls a battlefield, I enter ready. When I conquer, you may pay 1 energy to return me to my owner's hand.
rows.raw: [Assault 3]_ (+3 might while I'm an attacker.)_ If an opponent controls a battlefield, I enter ready. When I conquer, you may pay 1 energy to return me to my owner's hand.

rows.name: Teemo, Strategist
rows.text: [Hidden] (Hide now for 1 rune of any type to react with later for 0 energy.) When I defend or I'm played from [Hidden], reveal the top 5 cards of your Main Deck. Deal 1 to an enemy unit here for each card with [Hidden], then recycle them.
rows.raw:
[Hidden] (Hide now for 1 rune of any type to react with later for 0 energy.)
When I defend or I'm played from [Hidden], reveal the top 5 cards of your Main Deck. Deal 1 to an enemy unit here for each card with [Hidden], then recycle them.

rows.name: Sett, Brawler
rows.trigger: When I'm played and when I conquer
rows.text: buff me. (If I don't have a buff, I get a +1 might buff.) Spend my buff: Give me +4 might this turn.
rows.raw: When I'm played and when I conquer, buff me. (If I don't have a buff, I get a +1 might buff.) Spend my buff: Give me +4 might this turn.

rows.name: Karma, Channeler
rows.text: [Vision] (When you play me, look at the top card of your Main Deck. You may recycle it.) When you recycle one or more cards, buff a friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 might buff. Runes aren't cards.)
rows.raw:
[Vision] (When you play me, look at the top card of your Main Deck. You may recycle it.)
When you recycle one or more cards, buff a friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 might buff. Runes aren't cards.)

rows.name: Darius, Executioner
rows.text: [Legion] — When you play me, ready me. (Get the effect if you've played another card this turn) Other friendly units have +1 might here.
rows.raw: [Legion] — When you play me, ready me. (Get the effect if you've played another card this turn) Other friendly units have +1 might here.

rows.raw: exhaust: [Reaction], [Legion] — [Add] 1 energy. (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to. Get the effect if you've played a card this turn.)

rows.raw: 1 energy, exhaust: Buff a friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 might buff.)

rows.name: Radiant Dawn
rows.trigger: When you stun one or more enemy units
rows.text: buff a friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 might buff.)
rows.raw: When you stun one or more enemy units, buff a friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 might buff.)

rows.name: Swift Scout
rows.text: You may pay 1 energy to hide a card with [Hidden] instead of 1 rune of any type. 1 energy, exhaust: Put a Teemo unit you own into your hand from your Champion Zone or the board.
rows.raw: You may pay 1 energy to hide a card with [Hidden] instead of 1 rune of any type. 1 energy, exhaust: Put a Teemo unit you own into your hand from your Champion Zone or the board.

rows.name: The Boss
rows.trigger: When a buffed unit you control would die
rows.text: you may pay 1 rune of any type and exhaust me to spend its buff and recall it exhausted instead. (Send it to base. This isn't a move.) When you conquer, ready me.
rows.raw:
When a buffed unit you control would die, you may pay 1 rune of any type and exhaust me to spend its buff and recall it exhausted instead. (Send it to base. This isn't a move.)
When you conquer, ready me.
